title: Ping now 98 when it was 24 before patch
body:
My internet is fine. Pings to google get me between 24 and 26ms and all other games have a similar ping to that. Just league is sitting at 98ms consistently. Before this patch I was sitting at 24-29ms every game. Pretty sure it's gonna be on my end but I have no idea what could be causing such a high ping for only one game. I'm on windows 7 if that means anything. Any and all help would be appreciated because I love playing this game.

As a side note, my ping does go up if I start downloading or whatnot. So I do know that I can manipulate it.

replies.body: We've received quite a few reports on this, and it looks like there's currently an issue with ATT causing an increase in ping for a few players.  Check your network provider's support page in case they have updates specific to your area, otherwise I'm happy to share updates as they come my way.  Thanks for the reports!
I have been having the same issues, except I'm on optimum :/

> [{quoted}](name=cosmictrashbin,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=tQIAbq5c,comment-id=00050000,timestamp=2017-03-01T22:34:39.159+0000)
>
> I have been having the same issues, except I'm on optimum :/

Same here. Everyone else has AT&T but I have Optimum and having the same issue.
Whatever the issue was it seems to have resolved because my ping is now in the mid 20s ms.
Having the exact same problem. I am on Windows 7. AT&T internet. Missouri. Ping used to be 40, stuck at 93 now. feelsbadman plz help
I too have At&T and having the same issue {{sticker:zombie-nunu-tears}}
So it's not riot doing it's At&T? Well I just gotta wait then
also have at&t, and my ping has gone from ~60 to ~105

Your ISP is way more relevant than what your operating system is. Everybody who is dealing with this problem so far seems to be using AT&T as far as I am aware.

There are other threads about this, let's just sit tight until Riot is able to work their magic.
I do have AT&T. Thanks for letting me know.
